segments.text: I am going on a business trip to Guangzhou next Monday morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , as the New Year is coming , they ’ re organizing a party for all their customers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess you will meet many people in this field . So don ’ t forget to pack enough business cards in your suitcase .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , do you know that our company just made some changes in the business trip policy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , no one has informed me of that so far , tell me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , there is no cash advance anymore for short trips . You have to pay out of your own pocket , so save all the receipts from your business trip . And then attach them to your expense account . When you get back , our company will reimburse everything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What about the maximum purdy and rate , any change ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not sure . You can check with the finance department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will call them this afternoon , thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . Have a nice trip .
segments.speaker: S2
